ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 17 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D610 Digital SLR Camera with 24-85mm & 70-300mm VR Lenses, WU-1b, Bag & 32GB Card + <2> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <3> Xit MB-D14 Battery Grip + <4> Spare EN-EL15 Battery +
<5> Additional Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Battery Charger + <7> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <8> PD 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters +
<9> PD 72mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <10> PD GP-1 GPS Geotag Adapter + <11> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <12> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote +
<13> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <14> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <15> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <16> LCD Screen Protectors + <17> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D610 Digital SLR Camera with 24-85mm & 70-300mm VR Lenses, WU-1b, Bag & 32GB Card with 64GB Card + Flash + Grip + Batteries & Charger + Filters + Remote Kit
